thread.title: The Hills' Jason Wahler Celebrates Sobriety By Sharing A Photo Of His DUI Mugshot
thread.title_full: The Hills' Jason Wahler Celebrates Sobriety By Sharing A Photo Of His DUI Mugshot

author: Perez Hilton
title: The Hills' Jason Wahler Celebrates Sobriety By Sharing A Photo Of His DUI Mugshot
text:
Jason Wahler has come a long way since his troubled days on The Hills .
Struggling with his alcohol addiction, the former reality star often found himself getting in bar fights, arrested for DUIs, or even attempting suicide -- something he's been very open about in the seven years since making the decision to get sober on July 23, 2010.
Fast forward to now, Jason is happily married to his wife Ashley Slack , with whom he's expecting his first child (a baby GIRL!)! So exciting!
Related: Love, According To Lauren Conrad! 
Recognizing how far he's come on Thursday, the 30-year-old took to Instagram to share a before-and-after photo celebrating his sobriety: 
Before and After! A post shared by Jason Wahler (@jasonwahler) on Mar 23, 2017 at 11:58am PDT 
Wow.
Congrats, Jason! We're all rooting for you!
[ Image via Instagram . ]
